price: Ni ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaragerageje mu buryo butandukanye abantu bo hambere yabo inyuma y’ukubarungikira Intumwa. Burya Imana Allah, ni ukuri Izogaragariza abantu ku vyo Isanzwe Izi, ukuri kw’abemeye vy’ukuri muri bo, n’ikinyoma c’abemeye gusa ku karimi bitavuye ku mutima, maze hamenyekane imvugakuri n’umunyakinyoma. Izoheza rero Ihembere umugwi wose muri yo ivyo wakoze.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā alladhīna min qablihim falayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna ṣadaqū walayaʿlamanna al-kādhibīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
and He will surely make evident
